amendment.description: To provide for campus-based digital theft prevention.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2328 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2328 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S9739, S9756-9757; text: CR S9739; text as modified: CR S9739) To provide for campus-based digital theft prevention.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2328 proposed by Senator Reid.
